Item.Value: [Text:Hello! Hello! I am Wagren, merchant and wizard extraordinaire!][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Ah! I'm hoping you can help me. I'm looking for the following items!][Name:Requests]
[Text:Aha! Welcome! How can I help you today?][Selection:MerchantTalk][Name:Selection]
[Text:I may be used to life on the road, but I'm always happy to arrive in a nice place such as this!][Default]
